description: Episode number 7 of Series "The Photographic vision". Explores the factors to be considered when selecting film for a specific photographic situation. Commercial photographer, Jim Wood, discusses the process of choosing the most appropriate film for an assignment. Explains how the speed of a film determines its graininess, contrast, suitability for action shots, and sensitivity to various lighting conditions.
